ðŸ“– Summary: TUIOS is a terminal-based window manager built with Go that provides a modern interface for managing multiple terminal sessions. It offers a vim-like modal interface with keyboard shortcuts, workspace support, and mouse interaction, aiming to improve terminal workflow efficiency.
